name: Infinite Parkour City
description:
NOT CURRENTLY UNDER DEVELOPMENT AND MIGHT NOT WORK PROPERLY. Feel free to try the available builds though. Note there is 0 interesting traversal parkour in this.

How to play:

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • Go from your spawned position to a grounded position within the pillar or light which appears in the distance, that's it. Levels are random.

This is a game prototype I'm currently working on. It aims to combine three things:

  • Procedurally generated levels (basis). See
  • Parkour traversal (not started). See
  • Futuristic/artificial megastructure architecture (yet TBD). See
